headline: Assessing AES (AES) Valuation Following Recent Share Price Dip
summary: AES (AES) shares have been moving lately and have caught the attention of investors who watch utility stocks closely. Over the past month, the stock has dipped nearly 5%, even as broader market trends turned positive. See our latest analysis for AES. Looking at the bigger picture, AES’s 1-year total shareholder return of -3.3% shows the stock is still fighting headwinds. This is despite a 1-year share price return of 6.3% and a stronger showing over the last three months. While recent dips...
